events.name: ev battery supply chain
events.wd_description: The supply chain for electric vehicle (EV) batteries involves multiple processes, including extraction and refining of raw materials, production of battery components, and lifecycle assessments to quantify environmental impacts.
events.description: The supply chain for electric vehicle (EV) batteries involves multiple processes, including extraction and refining of raw materials, production of battery components, and lifecycle assessments to quantify environmental impacts.

events.name: upstream processes
events.wd_description: Upstream processes in the EV battery supply chain involve converting raw materials into battery components, with significant impacts not fully understood.
events.description: Upstream processes in the EV battery supply chain involve converting raw materials into battery components, with significant impacts not fully understood.

events.name: mining
events.wd_description: Mining involves extracting raw materials like cobalt from the earth, which are essential for producing battery components.
events.description: Mining involves extracting raw materials like cobalt from the earth, which are essential for producing battery components.

events.name: extraction
events.wd_description: Extraction processes involve separating valuable metals from the ore, crucial for the next stages of refining and manufacturing battery components.
events.description: Extraction processes involve separating valuable metals from the ore, crucial for the next stages of refining and manufacturing battery components.

events.name: refining
events.wd_description: Refining processes convert intermediate products into battery-grade materials, with impacts varying based on location and ore grade.
events.description: Refining processes convert intermediate products into battery-grade materials, with impacts varying based on location and ore grade.

events.name: life cycle assessment modeling
events.wd_description: Life cycle assessment (LCA) modeling is used to quantify the environmental impacts along the full supply chain for cobalt, including various impact pathways and scenarios.
events.description: Life cycle assessment (LCA) modeling is used to quantify the environmental impacts along the full supply chain for cobalt, including various impact pathways and scenarios.

events.name: openLCA platform
events.wd_description: The openLCA platform is used for modeling the life cycle assessment, utilizing data from public and private sources.
events.description: The openLCA platform is used for modeling the life cycle assessment, utilizing data from public and private sources.

events.name: environmental impacts
events.wd_description: The LCA quantifies various environmental impacts such as global warming potential, acidification potential, and eutrophication potential.
events.description: The LCA quantifies various environmental impacts such as global warming potential, acidification potential, and eutrophication potential.

events.name: impact pathways
events.wd_description: Various impact pathways are evaluated in the LCA, considering the mining, extraction, refining, transportation, use, and disposal of cobalt products.
events.description: Various impact pathways are evaluated in the LCA, considering the mining, extraction, refining, transportation, use, and disposal of cobalt products.

events.name: refining locations and energy options
events.wd_description: Refining locations and the energy options used in the refining process significantly impact the environmental outcomes of the cobalt supply chain.
events.description: Refining locations and the energy options used in the refining process significantly impact the environmental outcomes of the cobalt supply chain.

events.name: refinery locations
events.wd_description: The location of refineries can affect the environmental impacts, with refining outside of China showing a reduction in global warming potential.
events.description: The location of refineries can affect the environmental impacts, with refining outside of China showing a reduction in global warming potential.

events.name: energy options
events.wd_description: The energy options used in refining, such as wind or solar, influence the life cycle impacts, with wind generation showing lower impacts than solar.
events.description: The energy options used in refining, such as wind or solar, influence the life cycle impacts, with wind generation showing lower impacts than solar.

events.name: battery chemistries
events.wd_description: Different battery chemistries, including NCA, NMC111, and NMC811, have varying environmental impacts, with NMC811 showing the lowest impact.
events.description: Different battery chemistries, including NCA, NMC111, and NMC811, have varying environmental impacts, with NMC811 showing the lowest impact.

events.name: future market trends for EV batteries
events.wd_label: future market trends for EV batteries
events.wd_description: The market for EV batteries is expected to grow significantly, with various chemistries such as NMC, NCA, and LFP playing key roles in both EVs and energy storage systems (ESS).
events.description: The market for EV batteries is expected to grow significantly, with various chemistries such as NMC, NCA, and LFP playing key roles in both EVs and energy storage systems (ESS).

events.name: NMC batteries
events.wd_description: NMC batteries are widely used in EVs and ESS, with trends showing an increase in nickel content and a decrease in cobalt.
events.description: NMC batteries are widely used in EVs and ESS, with trends showing an increase in nickel content and a decrease in cobalt.

events.name: NMC111
events.wd_description: NMC111 batteries have a balanced ratio of nickel, manganese, and cobalt, offering a stable performance but lower energy density compared to newer chemistries.
events.description: NMC111 batteries have a balanced ratio of nickel, manganese, and cobalt, offering a stable performance but lower energy density compared to newer chemistries.

events.name: NMC811
events.wd_description: NMC811 batteries have a higher energy density due to a higher ratio of nickel compared to manganese and cobalt.
events.description: NMC811 batteries have a higher energy density due to a higher ratio of nickel compared to manganese and cobalt.

events.name: NCA batteries
events.wd_description: NCA batteries have the highest energy density among commercially available LIB technologies, with an increased ratio of nickel compared to cobalt.
events.description: NCA batteries have the highest energy density among commercially available LIB technologies, with an increased ratio of nickel compared to cobalt.

events.name: LFP batteries
events.wd_description: LFP batteries are known for their safety and cost-effectiveness, making them suitable for both EVs and ESS despite lower energy density.
events.description: LFP batteries are known for their safety and cost-effectiveness, making them suitable for both EVs and ESS despite lower energy density.

events.name: Life Cycle Assessment  for Environmental Impact
events.description: Using LCA modeling to quantify environmental impacts along the full supply chain for cobalt in LIBs, including global warming potential, acidification potential, eutrophication potential, etc.

events.name: Battery Chemistries and Their Impacts
events.description: Analysis of different battery chemistries (NCA, NMC111, NMC811) and their environmental impacts.

events.name: Refining Locations and Their Impact on GWP
events.description: Refining locations (inside or outside China) and their effect on global warming potential (GWP).

events.name: Energy Options for Refining
events.description: The use of wind and solar energy options in refining processes and their environmental impacts.

events.name: Cobalt Supply Chain Processes
events.description: Mining, processing, refining, transportation, disposal, and recycling processes in the cobalt supply chain for LIBs.

events.name: Increasing Nickel Content in Battery Chemistries
events.description: Trends in increasing nickel content and reducing cobalt content in battery chemistries, such as in NMC111 to NMC811 transitions.
